title: Too low of a level to reply
body:
I'm unable to reply to any discussions, because I'm too low of a level but I've been level 30 for quite some time. I read that making a topic would allow me to comment, so just testing this. I'll delete after if it's possible to.

Edit: Can reply to this topic, but still not others. :(

replies.body: If you haven't been to the boards for a while or have never posted before, then your profile may need to sink.  Sometimes you just need to make a post or sometimes as simple as upvoting.  If you are still having issues, try [clearing your cache and cookies ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies)or run Incognito to troubleshoot.
Your level has been updated! Your Boards profile doesn't sync with your client profile until you post.
